CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - State to pay outstanding judgment debt;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and resides in the town of GPE , GPE region , GPE .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG against ORG No . CARDINAL - a ORG - owned enterprise - to recover compensation for work related injuries and other payments . By decision of DATE , the court awarded the applicant ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG suspended the enforcement proceedings in the applicant ’s case . On DATE the ORG ordered ORG to resume the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . By decisions of CARDINAL DATE and CARDINAL DATE , in the course of bankruptcy proceedings against the debtor , ORG of GPE imposed a ban on the seizure and sale of the debtor ’s assets .

CARDINAL . In DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG against ORG for failure to enforce the judgment in his favour . On DATE the court found against the applicant , finding no fault on the part of the bailiff . On DATE ORG of GPE upheld the decision of the first - instance court . On DATE the judge of the ORG adjourned consideration of the applicant ’s appeal in cassation for failure to comply with procedural requirements and to pay the court fees . The parties did not submit any information with regard to the outcome of these proceedings .

CARDINAL . In DATE ORG was reorganised and became a structural subdivision of ORG . As the latter thereby became the debtor , in DATE the enforcement proceedings were transferred to the ORG ( PERSON исполнительной службы Селидовского городского управления юстиции ) .

CARDINAL . The applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG against the Selidovskiy ORG claiming compensation for material and moral damage caused by a lengthy non - enforcement of the judgment in his favour . On DATE the ORG asked the applicant to pay a court fee . The parties did not submit any further information about these proceedings .
CARDINAL . The judgment of DATE has been enforced in part and the applicant was paid UAH CARDINAL , the remaining debt being UAH MONEY .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
